name: Kattespill
description:
A cute and casual game where you can pet cats, feed cats, wash cats and more!  Overall a great time!

    

How to play:

Left click to pick up and move cats

Drop them on objects you want them to interact with

Right click to pet the cats

 

Credits:

Programming by Faxdoc: https://twitter.com/Faxdocc

Art by NostalgiaTree: https://twitter.com/NostalgiaTree

Sound and music from Freesound.org: https://freesound.org/

Additional sounds by Vegard Jensen: https://twitter.com/TheVegardJensen
